Headline: #31 31st Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 31st/Rhodes
ShortDescription: Eastbound 3131st buses are temporarily rerouted via 31st, Vernon, 31st Place, Rhodes and 31st: due to, street blockage near 31st/Rhodes.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

Eastbound #31 31st buses are temporarily rerouted via 31st, Vernon, 31st Place, Rhodes, 31st and over regular route, due to street blockage near 31st/Rhodes.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #55A 55th/Austin Temporary Reroute near Austin/56th
ShortDescription: 55A 55th/Austin buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Austin/56th, due to street blockage near Austin/56th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#55A 55th/Austin buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Austin/56th, due to street blockage near Austin/56th.

Westbound #55A 55th/Austin buses will operate via Austin, 55th, Narragansett, 65th, Austin and over regular route.

Eastbound #55 55th/Austin buses will operate via Austin, 63rd, Narragansett, 55th, Austin and over regular route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem near 47th. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier mechanical problem near 47th.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
